data.eml:eml: Two new marine Gastrotricha from the Indian Ocean coast of South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Todaro, M. Antonio, Perissinotto, Renzo, Bownes, Sarah J. (2015): Two new marine Gastrotricha from the Indian Ocean coast of South Africa. Zootaxa 3905 (2): 193-208, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3905.2.2
